00193 template<class V, class T, class A>
00194 SPtr<Node> Geom<V,T,A>::clone() {
00195 
00196     SPtr<Node> clone(new Geom(this->name, trimesh));
00197     clone.smart_static_cast(SPtr<Geom<V,T,A> >())->localTransform->setTo(*(this->localTransform));
00198     clone.smart_static_cast(SPtr<Geom<V,T,A> >())->localAppearance->setTo(*(this->localAppearance));
00199 
00200     if(this->bounds.get()) {
00201         SPtr<BoundingVolume<V> > boundsClone(this->bounds->clone());
00202         clone.smart_static_cast(SPtr<Geom<V,T,A> >())->setBounds(boundsClone);
00203     }
00204 
00205     return clone;
00206 }
